public class TextAreaFrame
extends TranscriptTextArea

A text area that has its own frame and some buttons.

append

public void append(java.lang.String text)
Description copied from class: TranscriptTextArea
Appends the text, then moves the caret position to the end, which should also cause scrolling to the end. Note that the other append methods directly or indirectly call this one.
